title: ILoveQatar . net | Things to do in Doha : 24 - 30 November 2024
body_text:
Enjoy the many happenings in Qatar this week, including a jewellery & watches exhibition, football matches, F1 races, art events and more!
What are you going to do first?
For more events around you, visit iloveqatar.net/events!
29 November - 1 December 2024
Formula 1 Qatar Airways Qatar Grand Prix 2024
The Formula 1 Qatar Airways Qatar Grand Prix 2024 is all set to happen at the Lusail International Circuit! Watch the thrilling action unfold as the cars zoom past you! Are you ready for the action-packed weekend?
Details
- Location: Lusail Circuit Sports Club
- Date: 29 November - 1 December 2024
- Website: Click here
Until 30 November 2024
Lagoona Mall Watches & Jewellery Week
Step into a world of luxury and elegance at the 3rd edition of the Lagoona Mall Watches & Jewellery Week, where you will explore collections from some of the top regional and international brands.
Details
- Location: Level 1, facing Fifty One East
- Date: Until 30 November 2024
- Time: Saturday-Thursday: 10 am - 10 pm, Friday: 2 pm - 10 pm
- Instagram: @51_east, @lagoonamall
3-5 December 2024
Register for Qatar Medicare 2024
Be part of Qatar's premier medical exhibition and conference, Qatar Medicare 2024, set to take place from 3-5 December at the Doha Exhibition and Convention Center (DECC). This event will be opening doors to a world of opportunities that include new hospitals, specialized medical centres, and the expansion of existing facilities in Qatar. Book your space now by clicking here.
Details
- Location: Doha Exhibition and Convention Center
- Date: 3-5 December 2024
- Website: Click here
25-27 November 2024
Qatar Travel Mart 2024
Qatar Travel Mart showcases the latest trends in global travel and tourism. The event brings together key players in the industry, including hotels, tour operators, travel agencies, and tourism boards, to explore opportunities in Sports, MICE, Cultural, Medical, and Halal Tourism. A must-visit for travel professionals and enthusiasts!
Details
- Location: Doha Exhibition and Convention Center
- Date: 25-27 November 2024
- Time: 10 am - 7 pm
- Price: It's free - registration required!
- Website: Click here
28 November 2024
Legends El Clásico: Real Madrid vs Barcelona in Qatar
Go to a historic football match between the legendary players of Real Madrid and FC Barcelona at Khalifa International Stadium. Legends of the past will once again showcase their timeless skills. Don’t miss out on this extraordinary match!
Players participating:
- Iker Casillas
- David “El Guaje” Villa
- Luis Figo
- Ronaldinho
- Patrick Kluivert
- Rivaldo
- Clarence Seedorf
- Rivaldo and more!
Details
- Location: Khalifa International Stadium
- Date: 28 November 2024
- Time: 7 pm kick-off
- Price:
- CAT 1: QR 500
- Hospitality Ticket: QR 1,000
- Sales points:
- Lagoona Mall - Gate One
- West Walk - near Brown Cafe
- Website: Click here
28 November 2024
Misfits Boxing: Qatar The Supercard
Get ready for a night of boxing action at The Supercard at Lusail Sports Arena! Don't miss this evening of action and excitement! Please note that the minimum age for attending the event is 14.
Details
- Location: Lusail Multipurpose Hall
- Date: 28 November 2024
- Time: 4 pm onwards
- Price:
- VVIP: QR 2,500
- VIP: QR 1,000
- Category 1: QR 200
- Category 2: QR 150
- Website: Click here
30 November 2024
Thai Souq Fest 2024: A Celebration of Flavors, Culture, and Muay Thai
Enjoy Thai Cuisine, crafts, cultural performances, an interactive Muay Thai workshop, a photo booth and fun activities at the Thai Souq Fest 2024!
Details
- Location: Royal Thai Embassy, Doha
- Date: 30 November 2024
- Time: 12 pm - 4 pm
- Price: Come - It's free!
- Website: Click here
27 November - 14 December 2024
Aladdin - Everything you could wish for by The Doha Players
Will Aladdin save the day, will he marry the beautiful Princess Jasmine? Will the Genie be freed? There’s only one way to find out. Go see Aladdin by joining The Doha Players for a hilarious and heart-warming adventure filled with laughter, love, and magic. This is recommended for all ages 4 and above and suitable for younger ages.
Details
- Location: Community Theatre Group, Mesaimeer Area
- Date: 27 November - 14 December 2024
- Time: 7:30 pm - 10 pm
- Ticket Purchase: Online
- Price:
- Platinum: QR 200
- Gold: QR 160
- Silver: QR 100
- Family Gold: QR 480
- Family Silver: QR 300
- Phone: +974 5575 5102
- Website: Click here
28-30 November 2024
Live Stage Show and Meet & Greet With Natsya
Go to the live shows and get a chance to meet and greet Nastya at the Oasis Stage. Snap photos, make memories, and join in on the fun!
Details
- Location: Mall of Qatar
- Date: 28-30 November 2024
- Time: 7 pm - 9 pm
- Ticket Purchase: No tickets needed
- Price: It's free!
- Website: Click here
28 November - 2 December 2024
Al Ghorrah for Literature and Arts 2024
Dive into the world of arts, including theatre, music, and more at the AlGhorrah for Literature and Arts. The event will feature live performances by regional artists, a talent stage, multicultural zone with various activities like bookmark making, chest decorating, leather crafting and more.
Details
- Location: Oxygen Park
- Date: 28 November - 2 December 2024
- Time: 5 pm - 10 pm (event agenda)
- Ticket Purchase: Online
- Price:
- Adult: QR 50
- Child (Under 14 y/o): QR 35
- Website: Click here
25 November 2024
AFC Champions League Elite: Al Gharafa (QAT) vs Al Nassr (KSA)
Qatar's Al Gharafa will face Saudi Arabia's Al Nassr on 25 November 2024 for the 2024-2025 AFC Champions League Elite. The match will be held at the Al Bayt Stadium. Go and enjoy the match!
Details
- Location: Al Bayt Stadium
- Date: 25 November 2024
- Time: 7 pm kick-off
- Price:
- CAT 2 Tickets - Start From QR 35
- CAT 1 Tickets - Start From QR 80
- VIP Tickets - Start From QR 400
- Individual Sky Box Seat - Start From QR 650
- Sky Box - Start From QR 7,800
- Website: Click here
29 November 2024
Neeraj Shridhar Live in Doha
Tap your feet to the tunes of the legendary singer Neeraj Shridhar of Bombay Vikings! A magical evening of nostalia awaits you as he performs some of his iconic hits - don't miss it! This event is for ages 18 and above.
Details
- Location: Black Orchid, Mondrian Doha
- Date: 29 November 2024
- Time: 10 pm - 2 am
- Ticket Purchase: Online
- Price:
- Phase 1: QR 75 (these are the only available tickets for now)
- Phone: +974 4466 1996
- Website: Click here
Until 1 April 2025
“The Race Is On” Exhibition
The Race is On exhibition showcases Formula One and rally history and examines Qatar’s journey as an international host and competitor, from the first Qatar Motor Rally in 1975 to last year’s successful Formula 1 Qatar Grand Prix at Lusail International Circuit.
Please note that due to the Legends El Clásico football game being held at Khalifa Stadium on 28 November 2024, the museum announced temporary changes to access to visitors on 27 & 28 November 2024 only.
27 November 2024
- Open from 2 pm – 7 pm
- Entry via Gate F
- Visitors must have a pre-booked museum ticket to enter
28 November 2024
- Open exclusively to Legends El Clásico ticket holders
- Museum accessible before and after the match
Details
- Location: E8 Exhibition Gallery, 3-2-1 Qatar Olympic and Sports Museum
- Date: Until 1 April 2025
- Time (regular hours):
- Sunday, Monday, Wednesday, Saturday: 9 am - 7 pm
- Tuesday: Closed
- Thursday: 9 am - 9 pm
- Friday: 1:30 pm - 7 pm
- Price:
- Residents - It's free!
- Non-resident adult: QR 50
- Non-resident student: QR 25
- Website: Click here
Until 30 November 2024
F1-themed fan activation zones (Formula 1™ Qatar Airways Qatar Grand Prix 2024)
Check out the fun F1-themed fan activation zones in Doha offering an array of engaging activities for all ages to build excitement ahead of the race.
Details
- Location: West Walk and Place Vendôme Mall
- Date: Until 30 November 2024
- Time: Sunday - Wednesday: 12 pm - 10 pm; Thursday - Saturday: 12 pm - 11 pm
- Website: Click here
Until 30 November 2024
Umm Salal Winter Festival 2024
Buy and support local products from farms and factories in Qatar! Visit the Umm Salal Winter Festival 2024, which runs until 30 November 2024.
RELATED: Winter markets/bazaars to check out in Qatar
Details
- Location: Al Mazrouh Farmer's Marker
- Date: Until 30 November 2024
- Time: Saturday-Thursday: 8 am - 1 pm & 4 pm - 8 pm, Friday: 4 pm - 8 pm
- Ticket Purchase: No tickets needed
- Price: It's free!
- Website: Click here
27 November - 2 December 2024
Qatar Classic Cars Contest & Exhibition 2024
Are you into cars? At the 5th edition of the 2024 Luxury Classic Cars Contest & Exhibition, get to see many luxury and classic cars from owners participating from Qatar and across the GCC!
Details
- Location: Medina Centrale, The Pearl Island
- Date: 27 November - 2 December 2024
- Time: 11 am - 11 pm
- Price: It's free!
- Website: Click here
Until 22 February 2025
Seeing Is Believing: The Art and Influence of Gérôme
This art exhibition showcases the legacy of French painter and sculptor Jean-Léon Gérôme. Check out the works from the Orientalist art movement through photography and contemporary artworks from West Asia, North Africa and Central Asia.
Details
- Location: Mathaf: Arab Museum of Modern Art
- Date: Until 22 February 2025
- Time:
- Saturday-Sunday & Tuesday-Wednesday: 9 am - 6 pm
- Monday: Closed
- Thursday: 9 am - 8 pm
- Friday: 1:30 pm - 6 pm
- Price: It's free!
- Website: Click here
Which of these will you be doing this week? Please let us know in the comments section below, and share this article—it keeps us going!
